subtitle: Various class features, spells, and other abilities let you take an additional bonus action on your turn.

rules.title: Two-Weapon Fighting
rules.subtitle: Attack with a light weapon in your off hand
rules.description:
When you take the Attack action and attack with a light melee weapon that you're holding in one hand, you can use a bonus action to attack with a different light melee weapon that you're holding in the other hand.

You don't add your ability modifier to the damage of the bonus attack, unless that modifier is negative.

If either weapon has the thrown property, you can throw the weapon instead of making a melee attack with it.

rules.title: Cast a Spell
rules.subtitle: Cast a spell with a casting time of 1 bonus action
rules.description:
You can't cast a spell with your action and a different spell with your bonus action in the same turn, except when the action is used to cast a cantrip.

See the action Cast a Spell for more details.

rules.title: Class Feature
rules.subtitle: Some class features are used as a bonus action
